english.segment1: Your whisper wakens me. I hear You. You enlighten me. I see You. I'm breathing out. Life's changing now
english.segment2: I'm alive. I feel on top of the world. I'm alive. Everything is real to me now
english.segment3: Incredible to be. So near You. A rush of energy. I feel You. I'm breathing out. Life's changing now
english.segment4: My eyes open. I am mystified. Everything is beautiful.
